Parents and students, click the link below to submit a help ticket request for a damaged student device, or other student device technology related issue. Assignment questions should be sent to your teacher. Someone from the technology department will contact you via email or telephone as soon as possible.
Click this link for the form

div.div:
window._monsido = window._monsido || { token: "7j0O-PoOqg6FO6Ozo5Qm9w", statistics: { enabled: true, documentTracking: { enabled: false, documentCls: "monsido_download", documentIgnoreCls: "monsido_ignore_download", documentExt: ["pdf","doc","ppt","docx","pptx"], }, }, };
Welcome to Lakeland School Corporation!
Lakeland School Corporation embraces and is devoted to our mission: to educate and prepare ALL students for career and life success. We are excited for a new school year with new beginnings and a new commitment to excellence.
Lakeland Primary School will now serve all of our kindergarten through second grade students. Here students will start their educational journey in a nurturing and intellectually stimulating environment.
Lakeland Intermediate School will now serve all of our third through sixth grade students. Here students will build upon their strong primary foundation, exploring content at deeper levels in an energetic and encouraging environment.
Lakeland Junior/Senior High School will now serve all of our seventh through twelfth grade students. Here students will gain extensive experience in collaboration, problem-solving, and written and oral communication. With a wide variety of course options incorporating career and technical level rigor, students will develop durable work ethic that will stay with them beyond graduation.
With our students having access to one to one technology, we are committed to training our students to find the appropriate balance between screen time and social interaction. This is part of our focus on the social and emotional needs of all our students.
Because of our dedication to starting all of our children on a path to success, we are excited about piloting our new preschool program. Lakeland School Corporation is here as your partner to help your children find success from the moment they enter our schools to the day they receive their diplomas.
It is an honor to be a part of a team whose focus each and every day is to help each and every child learn, grow, and find success. Dr. Eva G. Merkel
Superintendent
